title: Define Quantum Sensor Requirements
description: Develop a comprehensive list of requirements for the quantum sensors used in the pollution detector.

title: Design Quantum Sensor Architecture
description: Develop the overall design for the quantum sensors, including their components and interaction.

title: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
description: Create an intuitive and user-friendly interface for users to interact with the pollution detector.

title: Implement Backend Services for Data Processing
description: Develop the backend services to process and analyze data received from the quantum sensors.

title: Establish Database Structure for Data Storage
description: Design and implement a database structure for storing and organizing sensor data.
dependencies: Implement Backend Services for Data Processing

title: Perform System Integration Testing
description: Test the overall system to ensure proper integration of all components.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
Implement Backend Services for Data Processing
Establish Database Structure for Data Storage

title: Review Quantum Sensor Design Documents
description: Review the design documents of the quantum sensors to ensure they meet requirements.

title: Review Frontend Interface Design and Implementation
description: Review the design and implementation of the frontend interface to ensure it meets user needs.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction

title: Review Backend Services Implementation
description: Review the implementation of backend services to ensure they process data correctly.
dependencies: Implement Backend Services for Data Processing

title: Review Database Structure Design and Implementation
description: Review the design and implementation of the database structure to ensure it's efficient and scalable.
dependencies: Establish Database Structure for Data Storage

title: Document System Design and Implementation
description: Write clear documentation for the system design and implementation.
